title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Toss the cooked spaghetti with the bacon and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in spices and grill until cooked.
In a pan, heat the tomato sauce with garam masala and paprika.
Add the grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in the heavy cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
